mahinda abesundara prasada pranama ulela ikuth 10 wanida anuradhapura samupakara gramiya banku shrawanagaraye di pawathwina.abesundara mahathage madhya diwiyata ada siyawasak pirima nimiththen nuwara kalawiya nidahas madhya padanama mangin mema prasada pranama ulela sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.anuradhapura di. es. senanayaka widyalaye thuryawadaka kandayama aaradhithayan piligena uthsawa bhumiya kara pamini athara, ehidi mahath harasarin abesundara mahatha piligath nuwara kalawiya madhyawediyo anuradhapura madhya widyalayiya sisu sisuwiyange athpolasan nada madin rathu palasa mathin ee mahatha shrawanagaraya wetha kandawagena giyaha.chiragatha sampradayanukulawa pawathi aagamika wathawath walin anathuruwa prasada pranama ulela aarambha keruni.
